description: Pope Francis wrapped up his two-day visit to Philadelphia, where he spoke on the matter of sexual abuse in the Roman Catholic Church before he flew back to Rome.
title: Pope Francis Visits: Day 9
title_page: Pope Francis Visits: Day 9 - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Pope Francis wrapped up his two-day visit to Philadelphia, where he spoke on the matter of sexual abuse in the Roman Catholic Church before he flew back to Rome.
